title: Payment of wages by check or electronic transfer
context: ยง388-5.5 Payment of wages by check or electronic transfer. Whenever an employee receives the employee&rsquo;s wages from the employee&rsquo;s employer in the form of a check or electronic transfer for which insufficient amounts are available in the bank account of the employer, the employer shall be liable for any bank&rsquo;s special handling fee which the employee may incur by reason of negotiating the check or the electronic transfer. [L 1977, c 35, ยง1; gen ch 1985; am L 2014, c 208, ยง5]
